TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Contract extends System.Object
public ref class Contract abstract sealed

summary.span: 包含用于表示程序协定（如前置条件、后置条件和对象固定）的静态方法。

span.span: Contains static methods for representing program contracts such as preconditions, postconditions, and object invariants.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代码协定类使你可以在代码中指定前置条件、 后置条件和对象不变量。Code contract classes let you specify preconditions, postconditions, and object invariants in your code. 前置条件是输入方法或属性时必须满足的要求。Preconditions are requirements that must be met when entering a method or property. 后置条件描述在方法或属性代码退出时的预期。Postconditions describe expectations at the time the method or property code exits. 对象固定描述没有条件问题的类的预期的状态。Object invariants describe the expected state for a class that has no condition problems. 有关前置条件、 后置条件和对象不变量的详细信息，请参阅[代码约定](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/code-contracts.md)。For more information about preconditions, postconditions, and object invariants, see [Code Contracts](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/code-contracts.md). 有关使用代码协定的工具和详细说明，请参阅 MSDN DevLabs 网站上的[代码协定](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=152461)。For tools and detailed instructions for using code contracts, see [Code Contracts](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=152461) on the MSDN DevLabs Web site. > [!IMPORTANT] > 必须使用二进制重写程序插入运行时强制实施协定。You must use a binary rewriter to insert run-time enforcement of contracts. 否则，合同，如方法只能以静态方式测试并将不在运行时引发异常，如果违反了一个协定。Otherwise, contracts such as the method can only be tested statically and will not throw exceptions during run time if a contract is violated. 您可以下载二进制重写程序 CCRewrite 从[代码约定](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=152461)MSDN DevLabs 网站上。You can download the binary rewriter CCRewrite from [Code Contracts](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=152461) on the MSDN DevLabs Web site. CCRewrite 附带有 Visual Studio 外接程序，可用于激活从项目的运行时约定强制执行**属性**页。CCRewrite comes with a Visual Studio add-in that enables you to activate run-time contract enforcement from the project **Properties** page. 二进制重写程序和 Visual Studio 外接程序不会随附于[!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)]或 Windows SDK。The binary rewriter and the Visual Studio add-in do not ship with [!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)] or the Windows SDK.

summary.span: 在调试版本中，针对指定条件执行运行时测试。

span.span: In debug builds, performs a run-time test for a specified condition.

param.span: 要测试的条件表达式。

summary.span: 检查条件；如果条件为 ，则遵循为分析器设置的升级策略。

span.span: Checks for a condition; if the condition is , follows the escalation policy set for the analyzer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认的升级策略是以通知有关协定失败连接的调试器，或以显示**Assert**对话框中，如果未附加调试器。The default escalation policy is to notify the attached debugger about a contract failure or to display an **Assert** dialog box if a debugger is not attached. （可选） 可以指示分析器会引发异常。Optionally, the analyzer can be instructed to throw an exception.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Assert (bool condition, string userMessage);
.method public static hidebysig void Assert(bool condition, string userMessage) cil managed
Public Shared Sub Assert (condition As Boolean, userMessage As String)
public: static void Assert(bool condition, System::String ^ userMessage);
static member Assert : bool * string -> unit

param.name: condition
param.span: 要测试的条件表达式。

span.span: The conditional expression to test.

param.name: userMessage
param.span: 在不满足条件时要显示的消息。

span.span: A message to display if the condition is not met.

summary.span: 检查条件；如果条件为 ，则遵循由分析器设置的升级策略，并显示指定的消息。

span.span: Checks for a condition; if the condition is , follows the escalation policy set by the analyzer and displays the specified message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认的升级策略是以通知有关协定失败连接的调试器，或以显示**Assert**对话框中，如果未附加调试器。The default escalation policy is to notify the attached debugger about a contract failure or to display an **Assert** dialog box if a debugger is not attached. （可选） 可以指示分析器会引发异常。Optionally, the analyzer can be instructed to throw an exception. `userMessage`参数传递给调试器输出。The `userMessage` parameter is passed to the debugger output. 如果`userMessage`不是常量字符串文字，工具可能无法再读取它的权限。If `userMessage` is not a constant string literal, tools may not be able to read it.

summary.span: 指示代码分析工具假设某个条件为 （即使无法静态地证明该条件始终为 ）。

span.span: Instructs code analysis tools to assume that a condition is , even if it cannot be statically proven to always be .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`userMessage`不是常量字符串文本，协定可能无法理解的工具。If `userMessage` is not a constant string literal, the contract may not be understood by tools. 在运行时，使用此方法相当于使用方法。At run time, using this method is equivalent to using the method.

.event class System.EventHandler`1<class System.Diagnostics.Contracts.ContractFailedEventArgs> ContractFailed
Public Shared Custom Event ContractFailed As EventHandler(Of ContractFailedEventArgs)
public: static event EventHandler<System::Diagnostics::Contracts::ContractFailedEventArgs ^> ^ ContractFailed;
member this.ContractFailed : EventHandler<System.Diagnostics.Contracts.ContractFailedEventArgs>

summary.span: 协定失败时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a contract fails.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件的事件信息由传递给事件处理程序的 对象提供。The event information for this event is supplied by the object that is passed to the event handler. 此事件通知的托管应用程序环境，如交互式解释器或协定已失败的 Web 浏览器主机。This event notifies a managed application environment such as an interactive interpreter or a Web browser host that a contract has failed. 这样做之前将引发应用程序可以处理根据其认为合适的事件。Before doing so, it will raise an event that an application can handle as it sees fit. 例如，如果测试框架中运行代码时，可以记录测试失败，并最终测试。For example, if code is being run in a testing framework, you can log a test failure and then end the test. 默认实现.NET Framework 类库中的方法是调用注册的每个处理程序事件。The default implementation of the method in the .NET Framework class library is to call each handler that is registered with the event. 由处理程序引发的异常将被忽略，但每个处理程序可以指示是否通过调用处理失败事件参数的方法。Exceptions thrown by handlers are ignored, but each handler can indicate whether the failure is handled by calling the method for the event arguments. 如果任何处理程序将失败设置为已处理，该方法返回`null`并采取任何进一步的操作。If any handler sets the failure as handled, the method returns `null` and no further action is taken. 或者，可以调用处理程序方法，指示要展开的代码。Alternatively, handlers can call the method to instruct the code to unwind. 在这种情况下，执行所有处理程序后，会引发异常。In that case, an exception is thrown after all handlers have executed.

permission.span: 直接调用方需要完全信任。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 不能由部分受信任的或透明的代码使用此成员。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

summary.span: 当方法的协定仅包含 -- 形式的前置条件时，标记协定部分的结尾。

span.span: Marks the end of the contract section when a method's contracts contain only preconditions in the -- form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大多数代码已包含的窗体中的某些参数验证`if` - `then` - `throw`代码。Most code already contains some parameter validation in the form of `if`-`then`-`throw` code. 协定工具将识别`if` - `then` - `throw`语句作为前置条件语句出现在方法中，第一个和整个组此类语句后跟显式时方法调用，如， ， ，或。The contract tools recognize `if`-`then`-`throw` statements as preconditions when the statements appear first inside a method, and the entire set of such statements is followed by an explicit method call, such as a , , , or . 当`if` - `then` - `throw`语句出现在此窗体中，协定工具将它们识别为旧-需要语句。When `if`-`then`-`throw` statements appear in this form, the contract tools recognize them as legacy-require statements. 仅当未接其他协定使用窗体`if` - `then` - `throw`序列，但它们仍应标记为旧的需要。The form is used only if no other contracts follow the `if`-`then`-`throw` sequences, but they should still be tagged as legacy-requires.

summary.span: 为封闭方法或属性指定一个后置条件协定。

span.span: Specifies a postcondition contract for the enclosing method or property.

summary.span: 为封闭方法或属性指定一个后置条件协定。

span.span: Specifies a postcondition contract for the enclosing method or property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `condition`参数指定应为后置条件`true`封闭方法或属性时正常返回。The `condition` parameter specifies a postcondition that is expected to be `true` when the enclosing method or property returns normally. - 此方法调用必须是方法或属性之前的任何其他代码, 的开头。This method call must be at the beginning of a method or property, before any other code. - 必须使用二进制重写程序 (网址[代码约定](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=152461)MSDN DevLabs 网站上) 的运行时强制的此后置条件。You must use the binary rewriter (available at [Code Contracts](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=152461) on the MSDN DevLabs Web site) for run-time enforcement of this postcondition. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法，以确保返回预期值。The following example shows how to use the method to ensure that an expected value is returned. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[ContractExample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/contractexample/cs/program.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ContractExample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/contractexample/vb/program.vb#3)]

summary.span: 为提供的退出条件指定后置条件协定，并指定条件为 时要显示的消息。

span.span: Specifies a postcondition contract for a provided exit condition and a message to display if the condition is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `condition`参数指定应为后置条件`true`封闭方法或属性时正常返回。The `condition` parameter specifies a postcondition that is expected to be `true` when the enclosing method or property returns normally. - 此方法调用必须是方法或属性之前的任何其他代码, 的开头。This method call must be at the beginning of a method or property, before any other code. - 此协定公开给客户端;因此，它必须仅引用至少与封闭方法一样可见的成员。This contract is exposed to clients; therefore, it must only reference members that are at least as visible as the enclosing method. - 必须使用二进制重写程序 (网址[代码约定](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=152461)MSDN DevLabs 网站上) 的运行时强制的此后置条件。You must use the binary rewriter (available at [Code Contracts](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=152461) on the MSDN DevLabs Web site) for run-time enforcement of this postcondition. - 如果`userMessage`不是常量字符串文本，协定可能无法理解的工具。If `userMessage` is not a constant string literal, the contract may not be understood by tools.

summary.span: 基于提供的异常和条件为封闭方法或属性指定一个后置条件协定。

span.span: Specifies a postcondition contract for the enclosing method or property based on the provided exception and condition.

typeparam.span: 引发后置条件检查的异常的类型。

span.span: The type of exception that invokes the postcondition check.

param.name: condition
param.span: 要测试的条件表达式。

span.span: The conditional expression to test.

summary.span: 基于提供的异常和条件为封闭方法或属性指定一个后置条件协定。

span.span: Specifies a postcondition contract for the enclosing method or property, based on the provided exception and condition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `condition`参数指定应为后置条件`true`封闭方法或属性时异常终止和类型的异常`TException`引发。The `condition` parameter specifies a postcondition that is expected to be `true` when the enclosing method or property terminates abnormally and an exception of type `TException` is thrown. - 此方法调用必须是方法或属性之前的任何其他代码, 的开头。This method call must be at the beginning of a method or property, before any other code. - 此协定公开给客户端;因此，它必须仅引用至少与封闭方法一样可见的成员。This contract is exposed to clients; therefore, it must only reference members that are at least as visible as the enclosing method. - 必须为此后置条件的运行时强制使用二进制重写程序。You must use the binary rewriter for run-time enforcement of this postcondition.

summary.span: 基于提供的异常和条件为封闭方法或属性指定后置条件协定，并指定条件为 时要显示的消息。

span.span: Specifies a postcondition contract and a message to display if the condition is for the enclosing method or property, based on the provided exception and condition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `condition`参数指定应为后置条件`true`封闭方法或属性时异常终止和类型的异常`TException`引发。The `condition` parameter specifies a postcondition that is expected to be `true` when the enclosing method or property terminates abnormally and an exception of type `TException` is thrown. `message`参数指定一条消息，以显示如果条件为`false`。The `message` parameter specifies a message to display if the condition is `false`. - 此方法调用必须是方法或属性之前的任何其他代码, 的开头。This method call must be at the beginning of a method or property, before any other code. - 此协定公开给客户端;因此，它必须仅引用至少与封闭方法一样可见的成员。This contract is exposed to clients; therefore, it must only reference members that are at least as visible as the enclosing method. - 必须为此后置条件的运行时强制使用二进制重写程序。You must use the binary rewriter for run-time enforcement of this postcondition. - 如果`userMessage`不是常量字符串文本，协定可能无法理解的工具。If `userMessage` is not a constant string literal, the contract may not be understood by tools.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Invariant (bool condition);
.method public static hidebysig void Invariant(bool condition) cil managed
Public Shared Sub Invariant (condition As Boolean)
public: static void Invariant(bool condition);
static member Invariant : bool -> unit

param.name: condition
param.span: 要测试的条件表达式。

span.span: The conditional expression to test.

summary.span: 为封闭方法或属性指定一个固定的协定。

span.span: Specifies an invariant contract for the enclosing method or property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 协定包含在由标识的方法属性; 通常情况下，方法名为`ObjectInvariant`。 contracts are contained within a method that is identified by the attribute; typically, the method is named `ObjectInvariant`. - 只能在专用的固定条件方法声明的类上的中，可以指定此协定。This contract can be specified only in a dedicated invariant method that is declared on a class. 如果该方法不密封的它应仅涉及受保护的成员，不是私有成员，以便可以确保保持固定子类。If the method is not sealed, it should refer only to protected members, not private members, so that subclasses can be sure to maintain the invariants. - 此协定不公开给客户端;因此，它可能引用比封闭方法不可见的成员。This contract is not exposed to clients; therefore, it may reference members that are less visible than the enclosing method. - 必须为此固定的运行时强制使用二进制重写程序。You must use the binary rewriter for run-time enforcement of this invariant. - 固定条件有条件地定义根据是否存在`CONTRACTS FULL`符号。Invariants are conditionally defined based on the presence of the `CONTRACTS FULL` symbol. 在运行时检查期间，每次公共方法结束都要检查固定协定。During run-time checking, invariants are checked at the end of each public method. 如果固定协定提到相同类中的公共方法，通常会在该公共方法的末尾的固定协定检查是禁用并检查只会在对该类的最外层方法调用结束。If an invariant mentions a public method in the same class, the invariant check that would normally happen at the end of that public method is disabled and checked only at the end of the outermost method call to that class. 如果因调用其他类上的方法而重新输入类，也会发生此类情况。This also happens if the class is re-entered because of a call to a method on another class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 协定包含在由标识的方法属性; 通常情况下，方法名为`ObjectInvariant`。 contracts are contained within a method that is identified by the attribute; typically, the method is named `ObjectInvariant`. - 只能在专用的固定条件方法声明的类上的中，可以指定此协定。This contract can be specified only in a dedicated invariant method that is declared on a class. - 此协定不公开给客户端;因此，它可能引用比封闭方法不可见的成员。This contract is not exposed to clients; therefore, it may reference members that are less visible than the enclosing method. - 必须为此固定的运行时强制使用二进制重写程序。You must use the binary rewriter for run-time enforcement of this invariant. - 固定条件有条件地定义上`CONTRACTS FULL`符号。Invariants are conditionally defined on the `CONTRACTS FULL` symbol. 在运行时检查期间，每次公共方法结束都要检查固定协定。During run-time checking, invariants are checked at the end of each public method. 如果固定协定提到相同类中的公共方法，通常会在该公共方法的末尾的固定协定检查是禁用并检查只会在对该类的最外层方法调用结束。If an invariant mentions a public method in the same class, the invariant check that would normally happen at the end of that public method is disabled and checked only at the end of the outermost method call to that class. 如果因调用其他类上的方法而重新输入类，也会发生此类情况。This also happens if the class is re-entered because of a call to a method on another class.

summary.span: 为封闭方法或属性指定一个前置条件协定。

span.span: Specifies a precondition contract for the enclosing method or property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks - 此方法调用必须是方法或属性之前的任何其他代码, 的开头。This method call must be at the beginning of a method or property, before any other code. - 此协定公开给客户端;因此，它必须仅引用至少与封闭方法一样可见的成员。This contract is exposed to clients; therefore, it must only reference members that are at least as visible as the enclosing method. - 使用此方法，而不是方法时向后兼容性不会强制您可以引发特定异常。Use this method instead of the method when backward compatibility does not force you to throw a particular exception.

span.span: Specifies a precondition contract for the enclosing method or property, and throws an exception if the condition for the contract fails.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 你必须启用运行时检查，以使用方法。You must turn on run-time checking to use the method. 如果运行时检查处于关闭状态，则将终止进程。If run-time checking is turned off, the process will be terminated. 若要获取适用于运行时检查的工具，请参阅[代码约定](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=152461)MSDN DevLabs 网站上。To obtain the tools for runtime checking, see [Code Contracts](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=152461) on the MSDN DevLabs Web site. - 此方法调用必须是方法或属性之前的任何其他代码, 的开头。This method call must be at the beginning of a method or property, before any other code. - 此协定公开给客户端;因此，它必须仅引用至少与封闭方法一样可见的成员。This contract is exposed to clients; therefore, it must only reference members that are at least as visible as the enclosing method. - 使用此方法，而不是方法时您想要不满足前提条件失败时引发异常。Use this method instead of the method when you want to throw an exception if the precondition fails.

remarks.format: ## Remarks - > [!IMPORTANT] > 你必须启用运行时检查，以使用方法。You must turn on run-time checking to use the method. 如果运行时检查处于关闭状态，则将终止进程。If run-time checking is turned off, the process will be terminated. 若要获取适用于运行时检查的工具，请参阅[代码约定](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=152461)MSDN DevLabs 网站上。To obtain the tools for runtime checking, see [Code Contracts](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=152461) on the MSDN DevLabs Web site. 此方法调用必须是方法或属性之前的任何其他代码, 的开头。This method call must be at the beginning of a method or property, before any other code. - 此协定公开给客户端;因此，它必须仅引用至少与封闭方法一样可见的成员。This contract is exposed to clients; therefore, it must only reference members that are at least as visible as the enclosing method. - 使用此方法，而不是方法时您想要不满足前提条件失败时引发异常。Use this method instead of the method when you want to throw an exception if the precondition fails.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此方法仅在条件表达式中协定。This method can be used only in the conditional expression for the contract. 与 方法一样，每次编译器能推断出类型时都可发出泛型类型参数。As with the method, you can omit the generic type parameter whenever the compiler is able to infer its type. 协定重写程序将方法调用替换为 `out` 参数的值。The contract rewriter replaces the method call with the value of the `out` parameter. 方法仅可在后置条件中出现。The method may appear only in postconditions. 方法的参数必须为 `out` 参数或结构 `out` 参数的字段。The argument to the method must be an `out` parameter or a field of a structure `out` parameter. 在引用结构构造函数后置条件中的字段时，后者也非常有用。The latter is also useful when referring to fields in the postcondition of a structure constructor.
